property.label: Disable Advanced Tools
property.name: disableAdvancedTools
property.description: Set to true to disable expanded Rich Text tools - Search/Replace, Auto-replace, and blocked words/sybmols. Default is false.

property.label: Rich Text Value
property.name: value
property.description: Rich Text input/output to the Flow - this is the value you will be manipulating

property.label: Field Label
property.name: label
property.description: Label for the Rich Text field

property.label: Blocked Words
property.name: disallowedWordsList
property.description: Comma-separated list of words to block. Example: bad,worse,worst

property.label: Blocked Symbols
property.name: disallowedSymbolsList
property.description: Comma-separated list of words to block. Example: /,@,*

property.label: Auto Replace Map
property.name: autoReplaceMap
property.description: JSON for key:value pairs you want to replace. Key = value to replace, Value = value to replace with. Example: {"Test":"GreatTestâ„¢"}

property.label: Warning Only
property.name: warnOnly
property.description: Set to True if you want disallowed Symbols or Words to only alert and not block next/finish. Default is false.

property.label: Character Limit
property.name: characterLimit
property.description: If set, then the character count will be limited to this quantity.
